resources.string:
Welcome to UWF! 

We'll be your guide to student orientation. 

Please click the button below to continue

This is building 4, the Hal Marcus Computer Science and Engineering building.

This will be our focus for this application.

Please click the button below to proceed.

Next is the office of Dr. Bernd Owsnicki-Klewe, otherwise known as Dr. OK. He is the professor for several courses including the Capstone course for Fall 2022.

Please make your way to the fourth floor to scan the QR Code for his office

Please click the button when you wish to continue.

Make your way down to the third floor to find your classroom. 

This is classroom 349, used by several professors for many courses, including the Capstone course for Fall 2022. 

Please click the button and scan the QR code by the door to continue on your quest.
Now that you\'ve finished your orientation, please click the button below to take the quiz to complete your orientation quest.
1. What is the name of the building?
